test_cases.name: Validate Unauthenticated Backend Access
test_cases.description: Verify unauthorized access to the backend API is blocked by authentication mechanisms.
test_cases.scenario: Attempt to access the backend API endpoint without valid credentials and check for access denial.

test_cases.name: Validate User Input Sanitization
test_cases.description: Confirm malicious input (e.g., code injection) is rejected or sanitized by the system.
test_cases.scenario: Send a request with a payload containing script tags or SQL injection attempts and verify input is sanitized.
